name: Life is Paradise
description:
"Life is Paradise" is an RPG life management simulation game with a high degree of freedom.
Here you can build your own village, breed livestock, venture into mines, and make friends with all kinds of people!
As the protagonist, you can do whatever you want here!

※Scheduled Support Languages: Traditional Chinese、Japanese

===================================================== ===========

congratulations! Win a chance to travel the world for a week.
Please enjoy the "Paradise Island" surrounded by the ocean and nature
Start your second life!

♦ Build a village
Gather materials, build residents' homes, build the shops you want, and cultivate the ideal village!

♦ Collect farming
Fishing, raising animals, cultivating fields and vegetables, planting flowers and cutting trees
Live the leisurely days of your dreams!

♦ Uncharted Adventures
Team up with powerful inhabitants and explore labyrinths and mines!
